Class ChannelListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter

        • org.tribler.tsap.channels.ChannelListAdapter

  • public class ChannelListAdapter
extends AbstractArrayListAdapter<Channel>
    Adapter for managing the data and views for a list of channels.
    Author:
    Dirk Schut

                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)

        Parameters:

        convertView - The view necessary update the text and image views
        parent - The parent view group
